column4: how doable would it be to upgrade my motherboard/cpu and keep my system configuration?
how doable would it be to change my motherboard/cpu (upgrade) and keep my system configuration?
it shouldnt affect your system at all unless your hardware is incompatable
so if i don't change any of my periferal and keep the same type of processor (amd64) it should be fine? i am hoping to ditch my athlonxp and move to something more recent
